refnamediv.refpurpose: Should a link to the longdesc be included in the HTML?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, links will be created to the HTML files created for the longdesc attribute. It makes no sense to turn enable this option without also enabling the $html.longdesc parameter.
The longdesc.link named template is called to construct the link.
